title: What happened?
author: JGray
text:
The question was asked: what happened to William's home arcana. The answer? Horrible, horrible things. We'll be exploring that before this story ends, I promise.

In the meanwhile, things aren't looking good here, are there? Riders on ants. Dogboys with bricks. Theresa could be in a real pickle...

replies.author: Ayra*Guest*
replies.text: Man, they really should use those awesome-looking bricks for making durable houses instead of using them to knock people out.

replies.author: Ysa
replies.text: Sometimes a friend "becomes an  enemy in order to remain a friend"   William is to cute and puppyish to be a bad guy. So he could be knocking Theresa out to save her life.  I remember reading that females are rare and highly valued for breeding purposes on William's Arcana.  And besides, Theresa's been needing some sense knocked into her for a while.

replies.author: Wolfgang*Guest*
replies.text: Where are those shadows coming from?

replies.author: quarktime*Guest*
replies.text: I think this is a good time to remind everyone to spay or neuter their pets...

replies.author: verias
replies.text: So, when William and Theresa were sent out, William wanted to go "clubbing"? *badum tish*

replies.author: Eric Tolle*Guest*
replies.text: Or maybe he just got tired of her 'tude. I mean, you don't go dissing a guy's ex, or his pile of rubble.

replies.author: Felix Ple»ôoianu*Guest*
replies.text:
I agree with Eric Tolle. Seriously, how insensitive can Theresa be? You don't go visiting somebody's home and start insulting it.

Suddenly, she's a lot less likeable. :-/
